PagingLandScape2

OgrePagingLandScapeData2D_Spline.cpp

00001 /********************************************************************************
00002         OgrePagingLandScapeData2D_Spline.cpp
00003         *****************************************************************************
00004         A NURBS-based heightfield generator for use with the pagingLandScapeplugin
00005         
00006         Note that it could easily be adapted for use as a general NURBS surface
00007         generator.
00008         *****************************************************************************
00009         begin                : Sat Nov 9 2003
00010         copyright            : (C) 2003 Chris "Antiarc" Heald
00011         email                : antiarc@captionthis.com
00012 ********************************************************************************/

00019 *   (at your option) any later version.                                                                                 *

00021 ********************************************************************************/

00038     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00039         PagingLandScapeData2D* PagingLandScapeData2D_Spline::newPage()
00040     {
00041        return new PagingLandScapeData2D_Spline(mParent);
00042     }
00043     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00044     PagingLandScapeData2D_Spline::PagingLandScapeData2D_Spline(PagingLandScapeData2DManager *dataMgr)
00045     : PagingLandScapeData2D(dataMgr),
00046         mSurface (0),
00047         mPoints (0)
00048     {
00049         mMaxheight = 256.0f * mParent->getOptions()->scale.y;
00050     }
00051 
00052     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00053     PagingLandScapeData2D_Spline::~PagingLandScapeData2D_Spline()
00054     {
00055             delete mSurface;
00056             delete[] mPoints;
00057     }
00058     //-------------------------------------------------------------------
00059     void PagingLandScapeData2D_Spline::_save()
00060     {
00061         
00062     }
00063     //-------------------------------------------------------------------
00064     const Real PagingLandScapeData2D_Spline::getMaxAbsoluteHeight(void) const
00065     { 
00066         return mParent->getOptions()->scale.y;
00067     }
00068     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00069     bool PagingLandScapeData2D_Spline::_load(const  unsigned int mX, const unsigned int mZ)
00070     {
00071                 int resolution  = mParent->getOptions()->PageSize;
00072                 mSize               = resolution;
00073                 mMax                    = static_cast <unsigned int> (mSize * mSize);
00074                 int pCount              = 50;
00075                 int mDegree             = 3;
00076                 Real MAX                = 500;
00077                 int tessLevel   = static_cast <unsigned int> (mSize);
00078 
00079                 srand (time(NULL));
00080 
00081                 mPoints = new Point4D[pCount * pCount];
00082                 const int knotVecSize = pCount + mDegree + 1;
00083                 float *knots = new float[knotVecSize];
00084                 int i;
00085                 for (i = 0; i < knotVecSize; i++)
00086                 {
00087                         if (i < mDegree)
00088                         {
00089                                 knots[i] = 0;
00090                         }
00091                         else if (i > knotVecSize - mDegree)
00092                         {
00093                                 knots[i] = knotVecSize - (2 * mDegree) + 1;
00094                         }
00095                         else
00096                         {
00097                                 knots[i] = i - mDegree + 1;
00098                         }
00099                 }
00100                 int dataSize = pCount * pCount;
00101                 for (i = 0; i < dataSize; i++)
00102                 {
00103                         mPoints[i].x = (int) (i/pCount);
00104                         mPoints[i].y = double (rand()) / MAX;
00105                         mPoints[i].w = 1;
00106                         mPoints[i].z = 0;//i % pCount;
00107                 }
00108                 mSurface = new CDRGNURBSSurface();
00109                 mSurface->Init(mDegree, mDegree, 
00110                         pCount, pCount, 
00111                         mPoints, 
00112                         knots, knots, 
00113                         tessLevel, tessLevel);
00114                 mSurface->TessellateSurface();
00115                 delete[] knots;
00116                 delete[] mPoints;
00117 
00118         mXDimension = mSize;
00119         mZDimension = mSize;
00120         mMaxArrayPos = resolution * resolution;
00121         mHeightData = new Real[mMaxArrayPos];
00122         Real scale = mParent->getOptions()->scale.y; 
00123         mMaxheight = 0.0f;
00124         unsigned int k;
00125         for (k = 0; k < mMaxArrayPos;  k ++)
00126         {  
00127             Real h =  static_cast<Real> (mSurface->getData(k).y * scale); 
00128             mHeightData[k] = h;
00129             mMaxheight = std::max (h, mMaxheight);
00130         }    
00131                 mIsLoaded = true;          
00132         return true;
00133     }
00134     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00135     void PagingLandScapeData2D_Spline::_load()
00136     {
00137         
00138     }
00139     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00140     void PagingLandScapeData2D_Spline::_unload()
00141     {       
00142                 delete mSurface;
00143         mSurface = 0;
00144             mIsLoaded = false;
00145     }
00146 
00147 } //namespace
